description: describes what is the purpose of having this file
octee: 3 options -  Never:octree should never be on, Off: octree is off by default, On: octree is on by default with 4 levels
max-compression-level: 3 options - None:no compression should be applied, Lossless: No or lossless supported, Lossy: No, lossless or lossy
scalars-description: lists the scalars that this file will contain, along with their default option. Some examples below
scalar-name: The first parameter has to be the Name of scalar field
scalar-coordinate: CoordX, CoordY, CoordZ or leave it blank for non coordinate type
scalar-extra-space: extra-space or leave it blank for non extra space
scalar-max-compression: max-compression-level:None, max-compression-level:Lossless, max-compression-level:Lossy, or leave it blank for no compression
